namespaces.namespace: Star Trek Fleet Command Wiki talk

revision.comment: adding tracking progress format for those who'd like to track what they collected. See https://community.fandom.com/wiki/User_blog:CuBaN_VeRcEttI/Table_Progress_Tracking_feature_is_now_available_for_all_wikis for more info
revision.text:
==Officer Gallery== See also, [[Officer Groups]]
[[File:ST Fleet Command Cadet James T Kirk.jpg|center|500px|Cadet James. T. Kirk]]
== Officers and their Abilities ==
'''Characters''' of the Star Trek franchise, STFC Game. '''Click For an [[Officer Guide]]'''
{| class="wikitable sortable" !Name !Captain Maneuver
activated when officer is captain of a ship. !Officer Ability
activated when officer assigned to bridge
inc Below Deck: if applicable !Below Deck Ability !Group !Rarity |- |style="text-align: center;" |Arkady Ivanov[[File:ST Fleet Command Arkady Ivanov.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Always Enthusiast - When the shield is depleted, Arkady has a 50% chance of inspiring Morale to the ship for 3 rounds. |Shields Refractor - Arkady increases the Shield Health of the ship by 10%. | |Enterprise Crew |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Hikaru Sulu[[File:ST Fleet Command Hikaru Sulu.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Do Not Test Me - When the ship is getting hit by a Critical Hit, Sulu has a 40% chance of inspiring Morale to the ship for one round. |Ranking Fire - When the ship has Morale, Sulu increases the total damage made by Energy Weapons by 15%. | |Enterprise Crew |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Montgomery Scott[[File:ST Fleet Command Montgomery Scott.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Miracle Worker - Scotty reduces the time needed to repair the ship by 10%. |Born Engineer - Scotty increases the total Hull Health of the ship by 10% of its original Hull Health. | |Enterprise Crew |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |'Bones' Leonard McCoy[[File:ST Fleet Command Leonard McCoy.png|frameless|80px|center]] |I'm a Doctor, not a... - McCoy gives a bonus of 20% to all the Officer Abilities of the Officers on the bridge during combat. |Excellent Medicine - Every time the ship gets hit, McCoy increases the Defense of all the officers on the Bridge by 10%. | |Enterprise Crew |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Spock[[File:ST Fleet Command Spock.jpg|frameless|80px|center]] |Logical - Spock increases the Accuracy of the ship by 15% at the beginning of each Round in combat. |Illogical - While the ship has Morale, Spock restores Shield Health to an amount equal to 25% of the Defense of the Officers on the ship. | |Enterprise Crew |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Nyota Uhura[[File:ST Fleet Command Nyota Uhura.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Hailing Frequencies Open - When the shield is depleted, Uhura has a 50% chance of delaying the next opponent weapon fire by one Round. |Target That Signal - Uhura increases the Accuracy of the ship she's in by 40%. | |Enterprise Crew |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |James T. Kirk[[File:ST Fleet Command James T Kirk epic.jpg|frameless|80px|center]] |Leader - As long as the ship has Morale, Kirk gives all Officers on the ship a bonus of 40% to all their stats. |Inspirational - At the beginning of each round, Kirk has a 50% chance of inspiring Morale to the ship for 2 rounds | |Enterprise Crew |Epic |- |style="text-align: center;" |Koth[[File:ST Fleet Command Koth.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Interceptor Overseer - Koth decreases the time needed to repair the ship by 20% if it is an Interceptor. |Open Them Up - As long as the opponent's ship has a Hull Breach, Koth increases the damage dealt by Kinetic Weapons by 5%. | |Klingon Patriots |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |M'Ral[[File:ST Fleet Command M'Ral.png|frameless|80px|center]] |On the Hunt - M'Ral increases the Armor Piercing of the ship by 20%. |Strengthener - M'Ral increases the total Attack of all Officers on the ship by 10%. | |Klingon Patriots |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Woteln[[File:ST Fleet Command Woteln.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Scattering Field - If the opponent's ship is a Battleship, Woteln increases the Damage of the weapons by 10%. |Interceptor Affinity - If the ship is an Interceptor, Woteln increases its Dodge value by 15%. | |Klingon Patriots |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Azetbur[[File:ST Fleet Command Azetbur.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Armor is Obsolete - When hitting the enemy with a Kinetic Weapon, Azetbur has a 20% chance of causing a Hull Breach for 2 rounds on the opponent's ship. |Contribution - Every time the ship hits with a weapon, Azetbur increases the Armor Piercing of the ship by 10%. | |Klingon Patriots |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Chang[[File:ST Fleet Command Chang.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Cry Havoc - As long as the opponent's ship Hull Health is under 60%, Chang increases the Damage of the weapons by 10%. |Dogs of War - If the ship deals a Critical Hit to the opponent's ship while it has a Hull Breach, Chang has a 30% chance of delaying its next weapon attack by 1 round | |Klingon Patriots |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Kerla[[File:ST Fleet Command Kerla.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Evasive Maneuvers - When the shields are depleted during during battle, Kerla increases the Dodge of the ship by 50%. |Attack Maneuvers - Kerla increases the Critical Hit Damage by 20% when firing with a Kinetic Weapon. | |Klingon Patriots |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Gorkon[[File:ST Fleet Command Gorkon.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Quick Victory - Gorkon increases the chances of dealing a Critical Hit by 10% for the first 2 Rounds. |Creating Opportunities - When the ship hits the opponent with a Critical Hit, Gorkon has a 70% chance of causing a Hull Breach for three rounds on the opponent's ship | |Klingon Patriots |Epic |- |style="text-align: center;" |Arix[[File:ST_Fleet_Command_Arix.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Plasma Backlash - Every time the opponent is hit by an energy weapon, Arix has a 10% chance of Burning it. |Powered Armor - As long as the ship's Hull Health is under 70% of its value at the start of combat, Arix increases its Armor by 15% | |Nero's Crew |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Javaid[[File:ST_Fleet_Command_Javaid.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Overwhelming Fire - Javaid increases the Shield Piercing of the ship by 20%. |Reinforcements - If the ship is a Battleship, Javaid increases its Armor by 15% | |Nero's Crew |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Vella[[File:ST_Fleet_Command_Vella.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Overmatch - If the opponent's ship is an Explorer, Vella increases the damage of weapons by 10%. |Sturdy Companion - Vella increases the total Health of all Officers on the ship by 5%. | |Nero's Crew |Uncommon |- | style="text-align: center;" |Vemet[[File:ST_Fleet_Command_Vemet.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Romulan Tenacity - If the ship survives an attack that depletes its shields and is destroyed in one of the following attacks during the same battle, the battle is lost but Vemet heals 5% of the Hull Health and the ship survives. |Feel the Heat - At the beginning of each round, if the opponent's ship is Burning. Vemet decreases its Shield Health by an amount equal to 20% of the Health of all Officers on the ship. | |Nero's Crew |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Kumak[[File:ST Fleet Command Kumak.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Discipline - At the beginning of each round, Kumak increases the stats of all Officers on the ship by 5%. |Watch the World Burn - As long as the enemy ship is Burning, Kumak increases the Armor, Shield Deflection and Dodge of the ship by 40%. | |Nero's Crew |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Livis[[File:ST Fleet Command Livis.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Wartime Repairs - Livis decreases the time needed to repair the ship by 10% if it is a Battleship. |Bolstered - If the ship is a Battleship, Livis increases its maximum Hull Health by 20%. | |Nero's Crew |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Nero[[File:ST Fleet Command Nero.jpg|frameless|80px|center]] |Joy in Vengeance - At the beginning of each round, if the opponent's ship is Burning, Nero increases the Damage of the weapons by 40%. |See the Flaws - Every time the ship strikes the opponent, Nero has a 25% chance of Burning it for two rounds. | |Nero's Crew |Epic |- |style="text-align: center;" |Qa'ug[[File:STFC Qa'ug.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Excel Under Pressure - When the ship gets a Hull Breach from the opponent, Qa'ug decreases all the stats of the officers on the opponent's ship by 35%. |Blood and Honor - When the ship gets a Hull Breach from the opponent, Qa'ug increases Accuracy by 30%. | |Blood & Honor |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Linkasa[[File:STFC Linkasa.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Way of the Klingon - After winning a battle, Linkasa increases the Defense of all the Officers on the ship by 10%. |Defensive Tactics - At the start of combat, Linkasa increases the Armor of the ship by 25% of the total Attack of the crew. | |Blood & Honor |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Yan'agh[[File:ST Fleet Command Yan'agh.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Klingon Tactics - When the opponent's ship Shield Health are depleted, Yan'agh increases the Weapon Damage by 10%. |Wolf Among the Ships - Yan'agh increases the Damage against Romulan ships by 25% of the crew's Health. | |Blood & Honor |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Krell[[File:ST Fleet Command Krell.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Retribution - Every time the ship gets Shield Health damage, Krell has a 30% chance of dealing a Hull Breach to the opponent for 1 round. |Federation Contacts - Krell increases the Damage against Federation ships by 25% of the crew's Defense. | |Blood & Honor |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Kuron |No Negotiations - Kuron has a 50% chance to automatically reload the first Kinetic Shot. |Merciless Pursue - After Killing a ship, Kuron increases the Impulse Speed by 25% for 30 seconds. | |Blood & Honor |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Mara[[File:ST Fleet Command Mara.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Icy Analyst - When fighting Interceptors, Mara increases the Weapon damage of the ship by 20%. |Wife of a Dahar - As long as the opponent ship has a Hull Breach, Mara decreases its Dodge by 20% at the end of each round. | |Blood & Honor |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Kang[[File:ST Fleet Command Kang.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Dahar Master - At the start of battle, Kang has a 80% chance of dealing a Hull Breach to the opponent for 3 rounds. |Blood Oath - At the start of battle, Kang increases the Accuracy of the ship by 100% of the Attack of the crew on the ship. | |Blood & Honor |Epic |- |style="text-align: center;" |D'jaoki[[File:ST Fleet Command D'jaoki.png|frameless|80px|center]] |War of Endurance - After winning a combat, D'jaoki increases the Health of all officers on the ship by 10% for 1 minute. |Shatter Defenses - As long as the opponent's ship is Burning, D'jaoki decreases the opponent's crew Health by 20%. | |Romulan Patriots |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |L'Nar[[File:ST Fleet Command L'Nar .png|frameless|80px|center]] |Romulan Health - L'Nar increases the Health of the Officers on the Bridge by 20%. |Klingon Pursue - L'Nar increases the Damage against Klingon ships by 25% of the crew's Attack. | |Romulan Patriots |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Severus[[File:ST Fleet Command Severus.jpg|frameless|80px|center]] |Spreading Fire - When the ship is Burning from the opponent, Severus decreases the opponent's Hull Health by 10% each round. |Exploit Overheat - When the ship is Burning from the opponent, Severus increases the Damage of the ship by 20%. | |Romulan Patriots |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Decius[[File:ST Fleet Command Decius.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Reckless - When fighting a ship with a bigger Strength, Decius increases Accuracy, Armor Piercing and Shield Piercing of the ship by 10%. |Honor Guard - Every time the ship gets hit, Decius increases its Weapon Damage by 6%. | |Romulan Patriots |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Mirek[[File:ST Fleet Command Mirek.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Burning Vengeance - Every time the ship gets hit, Mirek has a 20% chance of Burning the opponent's ship for 1 round. |Acid Bitterness - Mirek increases the Damage against Federation ships by 25% of the crew's Defense. | |Romulan Patriots |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Tal |Loyal Officer - When fighting Battleships, Tal increases the Weapon damage of the ship by 20%. |Resistance - As long as the opponent ship is Burning, Tal decreases its Hull Health by 5% each turn. | |Romulan Patriots |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Liviana Charvanek[[File:ST Fleet Command Liviana Charvanek.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Romulan Tactitian - When the ship's Hull Health goes under 70%, Charvanek has a 80% chance of Burning the opponent for 3 rounds. |Mind Games - At the start of combat, Charvanek increases the Armor Piercing of the ship by 100% of the Health of the crew on the ship. | |Romulan Patriots |Epic |- |style="text-align: center;" |Geoffrey Hadley[[File:STFC Geoffrey Hadley.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Galaxy Traveler - Hadley increases the Warp Speed of the ship by 15%. |Survey Trainer - Hadley increases Ship Experience gained on Survey ships by 40%. | |Shakedown Cruise |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Hendorff[[File:ST Fleet Command Hendorff.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Excellent Security - As long as Hull Health is below 60% of its value at the start of combat, Hendorff increases Dodge, Armor and Shield Deflection by 20%. |Explorer Trainer - Hendorff increases the Ship Experience gained on Explorers by 20%. | |Shakedown Cruise |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" | Mae Darwin[[File:STFC Mae Darwin.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Defending Power - When the ship is attacked by a player, Darwin increases the Weapon Damage by 10%. (PvP) |Interceptor Trainer - Darwin increases the Ship Experience gained on Interceptors by 20%. | |Shakedown Cruise |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Frank Leslie[[File:ST Fleet Command Frank Leslie.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Minor Damage Control - As long as the ship's Hull Health is under 35% of its value at the beginning of combat, Leslie restores it by 5% at the end of each round. |Battleship Trainer - Frank Leslie increases the Ship Experience gained on Battleships by 20% each turn. | |Shakedown Cruise |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Marlena Moreau[[File:ST Fleet Command Marlena Moreau.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Keep Going - After winning a battle, Moreau heals the Shield Health by 40%. |No Fear - Moreau decreases the Armor Piercing, Shield Piercing and Accuracy of Hostiles by 30%. (PvE) | |Shakedown Cruise |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Christopher Pike[[File:ST Fleet Command Christopher Pike.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Teaching Moments - Christopher Pike increases the effectiveness of all the Officer Abilities on the bridge by 20%. |Advanced Training - Christopher Pike increases the Ship XP earned by combat by 20%. | |Shakedown Cruise |Epic |- |style="text-align: center;" |Helvia[[File:ST Fleet Command Helvia.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Parsteel Miner - Helvia increases the Mining Rate of the ship by 20% when mining Parsteel. |Gold Rush - As long as the Cargo of the ship is empty, Helvia increases its Warp Speed by 50%. | |Surveyors & Miners |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |K'Bisch[[File:ST Fleet Command K'Bisch.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Tritanium Miner - K'Bisch increases the Mining Rate of the ship by 50% when mining Tritanium. |Defensive Mining - As long as the ship is mining, K'Bisch reduces the damage dealt by attacking opponents by 12%. | |Surveyors & Miners |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Domitia[[File:ST_Fleet_Command_Domitia.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Dilithium Miner - Domitia increases the Mining Rate of the ship by 20% when mining Dilithium. |Hurry Home - As long as the Cargo of the ship is full, Domitia increases its Warp Speed by 50%. | |Surveyors & Miners |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Stonn[[File:ST_Fleet_Command_Stonn.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Ore Miner - Stonn increases the Mining Rate of the ship by 20% when mining Ore. |Pack Rat - Stonn increases the Cargo size of the ship by 20%. | |Surveyors & Miners |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |T'Pring[[File:ST_Fleet_Command_T'Pring.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Gas Miner - T'Pring increases the Mining Rate of the ship by 20% when mining Gas. |Hidden Stash - T'Pring increases the protection of The Cargo by 50%. | |Surveyors & Miners |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Barot[[File:ST_Fleet_Command_Barot.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Crystal Miner - Barot increases the rate of Crystal Mining by 20%. |Deceptive Weakness - When the ship becomes attacked while mining, at the beginning of combat, Barot decreases the opponent's Hull Health by 10%. | |Surveyors & Miners |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" | Elea Makinen[[File:STFC Elea Makinen.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Advanced Mining – Elea Makinen increases the mining speed of the ship by 10% |Isogen Mining – Elea Makinen increases the rate of Isogen Mining by 20, 40, 60, 80 or 100% | |Surveyors & Miners |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Raphael DuPont[[File:STFC Raphael Dupont.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Grade 3 Miner – Raphael DuPont increases the rate of G3 Crystal, Gas and Ore Mining by 40% |Adds to the Ships Protected Cargo by 50, 100, 150, 200 or 300% | |Surveyors & Miners |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Zahra[[File:ST_Fleet_Command_Zahra.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Station Expert - When defending the Station, Zahra increases the ship's Hull Health by 10%. |Home Engineer - When defending the Station, Zahra increases the Weapon Damage by 5%. | |Auxiliary Controls |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Jabilo M'Benga[[File:ST Fleet Command Jabilo M'Benga.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Break Through - When defending the Station, M'Benga increases the Armor Piercing, Shield Piercing and Accuracy of the ship by 10%. |Slip Through - When defending the station, M'Benga increases Dodge, Armor and Shield Deflection by 10%. | |Auxiliary Controls |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Officer 0718[[File:ST_Fleet_Command_Officer_0718.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Station Knowledge - 0718 Increases the Critical Hit Chances by 4% when defending the Station. |Computer Precision - 0718 increases the Defense of all Officers on the ship by 5%. | |Auxiliary Controls |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Keenser[[File:ST Fleet Command Keenser.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Emergency Repairs - As long as the ship is in the Station, Keenser increases its Hull Health by 20%. Goes up to 50% with maximum Synergy Bonus. |Fine Tuning - As long as the ship is in the Station, Keenser increases its Shield Health by 20%. Goes up to 40% at Rank 5. | |Auxiliary Controls |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Carol Marcus[[File:ST Fleet Command Carol Marcus.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Applied Science - When defending your Station, Carol decreases the Weapon Damage from opponents by 40%. |Weapons Expert - Carol increases the Weapon Damage by 20%. | |Auxiliary Controls |Epic |- |style="text-align: center;" | Gary Mitchell[[File:ST Fleet Command Gary Mitchell.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Home Protector - Mitchell increases the Stats of all Officers on Board by 20% when defending the Station. |Think or Sink - When getting hit by a Critical Hit, Mitchell increases the ship Weapon Damage by 30%. | |Auxiliary Controls |Epic |- |style="text-align: center;" | Vel K'Bentayr[[File:ST Fleet Command Vel K'Bentayr.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Dilithium Hunter - Vel increases the Dilithium rewards for defeating a Hostile by 25%. (PvE) |Chirurgical Precision - If the opponent is a Hostile, Vel increases the damage made by the Kinetic Weapons of the ship by 7%. (PvE) | |Starfleet Academy |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Shev Akria[[File:ST Fleet Command Shev Akria.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Tritanium Hunter - Shev increases the Tritanium rewards for defeating a Hostile by 25%. (PvE) |Justice Dealer - If the opponent is a Hostile, Shev increases the damage of the Energy Weapons of the ship by 5%. (PvE) | |Starfleet Academy |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Gaila[[File:ST Fleet Command Gaila.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Parsteel Hunter - Gaila increases the Parsteel rewards for defeating a Hostile by 25%. (PvE) |Critical Avoidance - If the opponent is a Hostile, Gaila decreases the damage from its Critical Hits by 20%. (PvE) | |Starfleet Academy |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |T'Laan[[File:ST Fleet Command T'Laan.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Thorough Scans - T'Laan increases the Ship Experience gained by fighting Hostiles by 15%. (PvE) |Objective Defense - If the opponent is Hostile, T'Laan decreases the Damage done by its Kinetic Weapons by 7%. (PvE) | |Starfleet Academy |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Grace Chen[[File:ST Fleet Command Grace Chen.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Modifications - Chen increases the Dodge, Shields Deflection and Armor of the ship by 20% against Hostiles. Works against Hostiles under level 50 (PvE) |Energy Absorber - If the opponent is a Hostile, Chen decreases the damage done by its Energy Weapons by 10%. Works against Hostiles under level 50. (PvE) | |Starfleet Academy |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Lucia Gonzales[[File:ST Fleet Command Lucia Gonzales .png|frameless|80px|center]] |Solution Finder - If the opponent is a Hostile, Gonzales increases the chances of dealing a Critical Hit by 8%. (PvE) |Problem Solver - If the opponent is a Hostile, Gonzales increases the damage of Critical Hits by 5%. (PvE) | |Starfleet Academy |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Komal[[File:ST Fleet Command Komal.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Battleship Specialist - When inside a Battleship, Komal increases Weapon Damage against players by 20%. (PvP) |Resist Kinetic - If the opponent is a player, Komal decreases the damage made by its Kinetic Weapons by 5%. (PvP) | |Glory In The Kill |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Rukor[[File:ST Fleet Command Rukor.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Explorer Specialist - When inside an Explorer, Rukor increases the Weapon Damage against players by 20%. (PvP) |Energy Boost - If the opponent is a player, Rukor increases the damage made by the Energy Weapons of the ship by 5%. (PvP) | |Glory In The Kill |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Vartoq[[File:ST Fleet Command Vartoq.jpg|frameless|80px|center]] |Interceptor Specialist - When inside an Interceptor, Vartoq increases Weapon Damage against players by 20%. (PvP) |Kinetic Boost - If the opponent is a player, Vartoq increases the damage made by the Kinetic Weapons of the ship by 5%. (PvP) | |Glory In The Kill |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Klaa[[File:ST Fleet Command Klaa.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Hot Pursuit - Increases the Impulse Speed of the ship by 25%. |Critical Strike - Increases the Critical Hit Damage of the ship by 8%. | |Glory In The Kill |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Vixis[[File:ST Fleet Command Vixis.jpg|frameless|80px|center]] |Fake Communiques - At the beginning of each round, Vixis has a 6% chance of delaying the opponent Weapon Fire by one round. |Energy Absorption - Decreases the Energy Weapon Damage of opponent players by 10%. | |Glory In The Kill |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Kras[[File:ST Fleet Command Kras.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Art of War - Decreases the effectiveness of the opponent's Captain's Maneuver by 20%. |Know Your Enemy - Decreases the Attack, Defense and Health of all the Officers on the Bridge of the opponent's ship 20%. | |Glory In The Kill |Epic |- |style="text-align: center;" |Cadet Montgomery Scott[[File:ST Fleet Command Cadet Montgomery Scott.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Sturdy Ship - Increases the Ship Hull Health by 10%. |Warp Theory - Increases the Warp Distance of the ship by 3. | |Another Time |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Instructor Spock[[File:ST Fleet Command Instructor Spock.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Knowledgeable - Increases the Weapon Damage of the ship by 5%. |Kobayashi Maru - Increases the Shield Deflection, Armor, and Dodge of the ship by 12%. | |Another Time |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Cadet Nyota Uhura[[File:ST Fleet Command Cadet Nyota Uhura.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Scan the Enemy - Decreases the Weapon Damage of the opponent's ship by 10%. |Negotiations - Increases the Shield Health of the ship by 9%. | |Another Time |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Cadet Hikaru Sulu[[File:ST Fleet Command Cadet Hikaru Sulu.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Big Shot - Increases the damage of first shots on the ship by 5% for the first round. |Fighting Spirit - Increases the Attack of all the Officers on the ship by 10%. | |Another Time |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Cadet James T. Kirk[[File:ST Fleet Command Cadet James T Kirk.jpg|frameless|80px|center]] |Motivational - Increases the Attack, Defense, and Health of all Officers on the Bridge by 20%. |Tactician - Increases the Weapon Damage of the ship by 8%. | |Another Time |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Cadet Leonard McCoy[[File:ST Fleet Command Cadet Leonard McCoy.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Doctor - Increases the Health of all Officers on the ship by 10%. |Psychologist - Increases the effectiveness of the Captain Maneuver by 6%. | |Another Time |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Joachim[[File:ST Fleet Command Joachim.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Patient Tactician - When attacking a Station, Joachim has 50% chances of greatly increasing the mitigation of the ship for one round. Increases to 100% Chances with maximum Synergy Bonus. |Unflinching Resolve - When attacking a Station, Joachim decreases the Weapon Damage of all opponent’s Ships and Defense Platforms by 10%. Increases to 30% at Rank 5. | |Khan's Crew |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Joaquin[[File:ST Fleet Command Joaquin.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Firewall Protection - Joaquin increases the Protected Cargo of the ship by 50%. Goes up to 100% with maximum Synergy bonus. |Data Miner - Joaquin increases the Mining Rate of the ship by 40% when mining Corrupted Data and Decoded Data.Unflinching Resolve. | |Khan's Crew |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |Kati[[File:ST Fleet Command Kati.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Hail of Fire - At the start of each round, if the target of the ship is a Defense Platform, Kati increases the Chances of a Critical Hit by 4% for that round. Goes up to 10% with maximum Synergy bonus. Destroy the Defense platforms by triggering more Critical Hits! |Enhanced Weaponry - When attacking a Station, Kati increases the Critical Hit Damage by 15%. Goes up to 40% at Rank 5 | |Khan's Crew |Common |- |style="text-align: center;" |Khan Noonien Singh[[File:ST Fleet Command Khan Noonien Singh.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Ruthless Mind - When attacking a station, 50% chance of drastically reducing the mitigation of all opponent's ships and defense platforms for 2 rounds. |Savage Tenacity - Everytime the ship is hit by a Defense Platform, Khan increases the Critical Hit chance by 1% | |Khan's Crew |Epic |- |style="text-align: center;" |Marla McGivers[[File:ST Fleet Command Marla McGivers.png|frameless|80px|center]] |History Repeats Itself - Marla increases the Repair Speed of the ship by 20%. Increases to 90% at Rank 5. | |Khan's Crew |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Otto[[File:ST Fleet Command Otto.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Smash the Defenses - At the start of each round, if the target of the ship is a Defense Platform, Otto increases the damage of the ship by 20% for that round. Goes up to 60% at Rank 5 | |Khan's Crew |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" |John Harrison[[File:STFC John Harrison.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Weapon Designer - When fighting Explorers, John Harrison increases the Weapon damage of the ship by 20% |Sabotage - For the first round of combat, John Harrison ignores 60% of the opponent's shield. | |Section 31 |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Alexander Marcus[[File:ST Fleet Command Alexander Marcus.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Overpower - At the start of each round, if the opponent's HHP is under 80% of its starting total, Alexander Marcus has 80% chance of inspiring Morale to the ship. |Shady Methods - At the star of the battle, Alexander Marcus increases the Shield Piercing of the ship by 100% of the Defense of the crew on the ship. | |Section 31 |Epic |- |style="text-align: center;" | Paul Zhou[[File:ST Fleet Command Paul Zhou.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Fresh Perspectives - Paul Zhou increases the Defense of all Officers on the bridge of the ship by 15% |Upper Hand - As long as the ship has morale, Paul Zhou increases the Shield deflection, Armor and Dodge of the ship by 30% of the crew's Defense. | |Section 31 |Uncommon |- |style="text-align: center;" | Yuki Sulu[[File:ST Fleet Command Yuki Sulu.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Disrupting Field - Yuki Sulu decreases the Shield Health of the opponent's ship by 10% for each round. |Romulan Grudge - Yuki Sulu increases the Damage against Romulan ships by 25% of the Health of the crew on the ship. | |Section 31 |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |One
Of Ten[[File:ST Fleet Command One Of Ten.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Adaptive Shielding - The ship mitigates 5% more damage to the Shield Health instead of the Hull Health. |Bodyguard - The Protected Cargo is increased by 30% with One of Ten. | |Unimatrix Twelve |Rare |- |style="text-align: center;" |Five of Ten[[File:STFC Five of Ten.png|frameless|80px|center]] |Jaylah Borgified: Five of Ten increases the Shield deflection, Armor and Dodge by a Percentage of the Total Health of all Officers on the ship. up. Lock and load! : Increases Isolytic Cascade Damage by 10/15/20/30/40% versus non-Armada Hostiles |Appropriate Adjustments: Increases your ship's base Max Cargo by 20/30/40/55/70% |Enterprise-E |Rare |- |ENT-E Tori[[File:EntE Tori.png|center|frameless|102x102px]] |n/a |Psychoanalysis: Reduces the opponent's Shield Health by 400/600/800/1200/1600% of total Officer Attack at the beginning of each round versus non-Armada Hostiles. |Three Shots of Something...: Increases Critical Hit Damage by 20/30/45/65/90% versus Armadas and Hostiles |Enterprise-E |Rare |- |Alonzo Freeman[[File:AlonzoFreeman.png|center|frameless|118x118px]] |n/a |Caro Bay Converter: Increases the Cargo size of the ship by 20/35/40/45/55%. |War Stories: Increases the base amount of positive Federation, Romulan, and Klingon reputation gained from defeating hostiles by 10/20/30/40/50%. |Lower Decks Crew |Rare |- |Doctor T'Ana[[File:Drtana.png|center|frameless|108x108px]] |n/a |Make a Mess: On round start, 40/45/55/75/100% chance to apply a random State to the enemy plater's ship for 3 rounds. Random States: Morale, Burning, Hull Breach |Bedside Manner: ON round start against players, Increases your Isolytic Defense by 50/80/120/180/250% for 1 round. |Lower Decks Crew |Epic |- |Shaxs[[File:Shaxs.png|center|frameless|112x112px]] | |Special Delivery: On round start, if on a Battleship and enemy player has Burning, increases your Isolytic Cascade damage by 60/75/90/110/130% for 1 round. |Your Pagh is Weak: On round start, if on an Explorer with Morale, increases your Isolytic Defense by 40/50/65/85/100% for 1 round against players. |Battleship Strike Team |Epic |- |Carol Freeman[[File:CarolFreeman.png|center|frameless|94x94px]] |Vocal Jazz: On Combat Start against players, increases your shots by 100% |Cerritos Strong!: On round start, if the enemy player has any state, increases your Isolytic Cascade damage by 60/75/90/110/130% for 1 round. | |Lower Decks Crew |Epic |- |Jack Ransom[[File:Jack Ransom.png|center|frameless|87x87px]] |n/a |Setting my Fists to Stun: On round start, if on an Explorer with Morale, increases your Isolytic Cascade damage by 60/75/90/110/130% for 1 round against players. |Exaggerated Confidence: On round start, if on an Interceptor and enemy has Hull Breach, increases your Isolytic Defense by 40/50/65/85/100% for 1 round |Explorer Strike Team |Epic |- |Andy Billups[[File:AndyBillups.png|center|frameless|78x78px]] |n/a |In Your Element: On round start, if on an Interceptor and enemy player has Hull Breach, increases your Isolytic Cascade damage by 60/75/90/110/130% for 1 round. |Two Decks Tall: On round start, if on a Battleship and enemy player has Burning, increases your Isolytic Defences by 40/50/65/85/100% for 1 round. |Interceptor Strike Team |Epic |- |Trip Tucker[[File:Trip Tucker.png|center|frameless|86x86px]] |n/a |Things Blow Up: When you take damage from a hostile or another player, decreases your opponent's critical damage by 50/80/120/180/250% for 2 rounds. (This ability can stack) (Does not trigger at Armada or Assults) |Hand in the Cookie Jar: Increases the amount of resources you get from destroying Hirogen and Species 8472 hostile by 30/60/80/100/150%. |Enterprise NX-01 |Epic |- |T'Pol[[File:TPol.png|center|frameless|91x91px]] |n/a |Threats Are Illogical: Increases Protected Cargo by 70/130/200/250/350%. |Vulcan Hydraulics: Increases Ore Mining speed by 50/80/110/150/200%. |Enterprise NX-01 |Rare |} ===Information=== *Also check the [[Battle Tips]] page for information on PvP / Player vs Player Levels

*See the [[Officer Guide]] page for other details *Credit for the extra Khan's Crew info goes to [https://kaptkaos.org Capt Kaos] with an excellent resource

*A popular [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1e-SaK4LK5GE812oNIKt45BAS1IZUtJ09pGMYIrEx3r8/edit Officers' Guide] '''by Capt Epictetus''' [[File:STFC_ship_crew_.jpg|center|large]] ==[[Officer Groups]]== *'''[[Officers/Enterprise Crew|Enterprise Crew]]''': Arkady, Sulu, Scotty, Bones, Spock, Uhura, Kirk - Morale *'''[[Officers/Klingon Patriots|Klingon Patriots]]''': Koth, M'Ral, Woteln, Azetbur, Chang, Kerla, Gorkon - Hull Breach *'''[[Officers/Nero's Crew|Nero's Crew]]''': Arix, Javaid, Vella, Vemet, Kumak, Livis, Nero - Burning *'''[[Officers/Blood and Honor |Blood & Honor]]''': Qa'ug, Linkasa, Yan'agh, Krell, Kuron, Mara, Kang - Hull Breach *'''[[Officers/Romulan Patriots|Romulan Patriots]]''': Gy'dos, L'nar, Severus, Decius, Mirek, Tal, Charvanek - Burning *'''[[Officers/Shakedown Cruise|Shakedown Cruise]]''': Darwin, Hadley, Hendroff, Leslie, Moreau, Mike *'''[[Officers/Surveyors and Miners|Surveyors & Miners]]''': K'Bisch (Tritanium), Helvia (Parsteel), Domitia (Dilithium), Stonn (Ore), T'Pring (Gas), Barot (Crystal) *'''[[Officers/Auxiliary Controls|Auxiliary Controls]]''': M'Benga, Zahra, 0718, Keenser, Marcus, Mitchell - These guys all improve station defense *'''[[Officers/Starfleet Academy|Starfleet Academy]]''': Shev (Tritanium), T'Laan, Vel (Dilithium), Gaila (Parsteel), Chen, Gonzales *'''[[Officers/Glory in the Kill|Glory in the Kill]]''': Komal (Battleship), Rukor (Explorer), Vartoq (Interceptor), Vixis, Klaa, Kras *'''[[Officers/Another Time|Another Time]]''': Cadets Kirk, McCoy, Scotty, Uhura, Sulu, Instructor Spock
